sections.heading: of insurance laws.(1) The insurance laws of this state shall not apply to captive insurers except as permitted in the Captive Insurers Act
sections.text: (2) The following provisions of Chapter 44 apply to captive insurers:(a) The Insurers Examination Act;(b) Sections 44-101, 44-101.01, 44-102, 44-103, 44-114, 44-
